about_the_game:
Your crew is stranded on an unknown planet. Learn its secrets to survive - search for food and fight alien life forms. Collect resources needed to craft equipment and repair your ship. Escape the planet to try your hand at the next ones, with a new crew and a new ship. Various planets await you, each with its own secrets to discover!

Explore unique alien planets with their own ecosystem, animals, weather, resources, dangers and phenomena. Understand the specifics of each planet and discover the ways to solve problems. Interact with alien races at different technological levels and their own, different way of behaving.

Hunt animals with varied behavior for food and other resources. Defend yourself from dangerous enemies and alien races. Choose the style that suits you best - whether it's close-range combat, a deadly shotgun, a long-range sniper rifle or many more.

Gather food and water for your crew to survive. Obtain different resources you need in a variety of ways. Discover the best methods for each planet. Think ahead to help your crew finish the mission.

Prepare advanced meals for better crew performance. Craft useful equipment to work more efficiently, to defend yourself or just to survive on the surface. Repair the machines on your ship to produce more advanced items and resources. Finally, repair your ship's propulsion and navigation system to escape the planet.

Equip your crew with proper tools for work and weapons for fight. Put on clothes to protect them from the planet's conditions or armor for combat. Use power assist to lift more, take a flashlight to see at night, and equip analyzers to detect threats.

Features

  • 6 unique planets (more in the future)

  • 15 characters with different skills and unique abilities (more in the future)

  • 3 ships with different furnitures, devices and robots (more in the future)

  • A lot of items to craft: tools, weapons, equipments, food and others

  • Alien races with different behaviors, interactions and technology

  • A system of changing weather, phenomena and time of day - different for each planet.

name: Worlds Explorers
short_description: Explore alien planets with carefully designed ecosystems, weather, resources, dangers and unique phenomena. Hunt animals for food and collect resources to craft equipment and repair devices on your ship. Escape each unique planet and unlock crew members and new ships.
